data.system_settings: Windows 10 Intel® Core™ i7 7700HQ Processor 7th gen
data.actual_result: The audio continues while the video isn't
data.expected_result: The audio should stop playing if you hover off the preview.
data.short_description: When you scroll all the way down and back up in the store, the sound will continue playing even when the video isn't
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the store - Go to Nitro Games - Drag the scroll bar down to the bottom of the page really fast - Hover over any game preview and enable audio - Hover mouse off of the preview (It does seem to be occasional and appear now and then)
